    Return the contents of a config file

    read_config_file.Rd

    Return the contents of a config file

    read_config_file(conf = NA)

    Arguments

    conf

    String. Either the path and name of a config file, or 'site', or 'user', or NA (the default). If NA, get_config will search the current directory for a config file.

    Value

    optionally nested named list or vector as returned by yaml::read_yaml, or NA if the appropriate file does not exist.

    Details

    The default search name for config files is "sqlhelper_db_conf.yml". If conf is 'site', 'user' or NA, a file with this name will be sought in rappdirs::site_config_dir, rappdirs::user_config_dir or the current working directory, respectively. In an interactive context, a warning will be issued if the sought file does not exist.

    Contents

    Developed by Matthew Roberts.
